title: Parenting diary of the strongest dragon who suddenly became a dad ～ Cute daughter, heartwarming and growing up to be the strongest in the human world ～
description:
A little girl visits a dragon who lives deep in the mountains.
She calls the dragon "Daddy" ...!?
